title: GA5 Question 8 Clarification
content: Use the model mentioned in the question, likely gpt-3.5-turbo.

title: Assignment 3 - Token Counting
content: To count tokens, follow the tokenizer approach similar to Prof. Anand's explanation.

title: Using AI Proxy with GPT Models
content: GPT-4o-mini is supported, but use gpt-3.5-turbo-0125 for assignment.

title: Confusion in Quiz 2
content: Clarification needed on whether median or mean is expected in Q4.

title: Clarification: How many tokens?
content: The model expects you to estimate number of tokens, not characters.
